member.name: M:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Policies.Unidecoder.Unidecode(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Transliterate Unicode string to ASCII string
member.param: String you want to transliterate into ASCII
The length of the result, if you know it (default is InputString.Length * 2)
member.returns: ASCII string: there are [?] (3 characters) in places of some unknown(?) unicode characters (same as original Python code)

member.name: T:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.AwsJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig
member.summary: AWS jittered exponential back-off configuration
member.remarks: At retry N the delay is randomUniformBetween(BaseDelay, min(MaxDelay, previousDelay * 3)) (first retry can be immediate, previousDelay initialized to BaseDelay)

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.AwsJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig.FirstDelayZero
member.summary: Whether the first retry should be performed immediately

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.AwsJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig.BaseDelay
member.summary: The number of milliseconds used as the base to compute the interval after which a retry is performed
member.remarks: Must be greater than or equal to 0

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.AwsJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig.MaxDelay
member.summary: The maximum number of milliseconds used to compute the interval after which a retry is performed
member.remarks: Must be greater than or equal to BaseDelay

member.name: M:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.AwsJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig.#ctor
member.summary: Builds a new instance of the AwsJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig class

member.name: T:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.BackoffType
member.summary: The throttling strategy to be used

member.name: F:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.BackoffType.Constant
member.summary: Constant delay

member.name: F:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.BackoffType.Linear
member.summary: Linearly increasing delay

member.name: F:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.BackoffType.Exponential
member.summary: Exponentially increasing delay

member.name: F:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.BackoffType.AwsJitteredExponential
member.summary: Exponentially increasing delay with decorrelated jitter (AWS formula)

member.name: F:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.BackoffType.PollyJitteredExponential
member.summary: Exponentially increasing delay with decorrelated jitter (Polly formula)

member.name: T:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.ConstantBackoffConfig
member.summary: Constant back-off configuration
member.remarks: At retry N the delay is BaseDelay (first retry can be immediate)

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.ConstantBackoffConfig.FirstDelayZero
member.summary: Whether the first retry should be performed immediately

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.ConstantBackoffConfig.BaseDelay
member.summary: The number of milliseconds used as the base to compute the interval after which a retry is performed
member.remarks: Must be greater than or equal to 0

member.summary: Enforcement configuration

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.EnforcementConfig.Throttling
member.summary: Throttling to be triggered when a configured number of log entries are waiting to be processed

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.EnforcementConfig.MessageProcessors
member.summary: The amount of parallel message processors

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.EnforcementConfig.SplitOnNewLine
member.summary: Whether or not to split each log entry by newlines and send each line separately

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.EnforcementConfig.Transliterate
member.summary: Whether or not to transliterate from Unicode to ASCII

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.EnforcementConfig.ReplaceInvalidCharacters
member.summary: Whether or not to replace invalid characters on the basis of RFC rules

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.EnforcementConfig.TruncateFieldsToMaxLength
member.summary: Whether or not to truncate fields to the max length specified in RFCs

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.EnforcementConfig.TruncateMessageTo
member.summary: The length to truncate the Syslog message to or zero

member.name: T:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.ExponentialBackoffConfig
member.summary: Exponential back-off configuration
member.remarks: At retry N the delay is BaseDelay * ScaleFactor^N (first retry can be immediate)

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.ExponentialBackoffConfig.FirstDelayZero
member.summary: Whether the first retry should be performed immediately

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.ExponentialBackoffConfig.BaseDelay
member.summary: The number of milliseconds used as the base to compute the interval after which a retry is performed
member.remarks: Must be greater than or equal to 0

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.ExponentialBackoffConfig.ScaleFactor
member.summary: The scale factor used to compute the interval after which a retry is performed
member.remarks: Must be greater than or equal to 1

member.summary: Builds a new instance of the ExponentialBackoffConfig class

member.name: T:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.KeepAliveConfig
member.summary: KeepAlive configuration

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.KeepAliveConfig.Enabled
member.summary: Whether to use keep-alive or not

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.KeepAliveConfig.RetryCount
member.summary: The number of unacknowledged keep-alive probes to send before considering the connection dead and terminating it
member.remarks: The default value, on TCP socket initialization is: - 5 on Windows 2000, Windows XP and Windows Server 2003 Can be changed editing the registry and is min(255, max(TcpMaxDataRetransmissions, PPTPTcpMaxDataRetransmissions)) - 10 on Windows Vista and later Can be changed only on Windows 10 V 1703 and later via SetSocketOption - 9 on Linux - 8 on OSX

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.KeepAliveConfig.Time
member.summary: The number of seconds a connection will remain idle before the first keep-alive probe is sent
member.remarks: No more used after the connection has been marked to need keep-alive The default value, on TCP socket initialization, is 2 hours

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.KeepAliveConfig.Interval
member.summary: The number of seconds a connection will wait for a keep-alive acknowledgement before sending another keepalive probe
member.remarks: The default value, on TCP socket initialization, is: - 1 second on Windows - 75 seconds on Linux - 75 second on OSX

member.name: M:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.KeepAliveConfig.#ctor
member.summary: Builds a new instance of the KeepAliveConfig class

member.name: T:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.LinearBackoffConfig
member.summary: Linear back-off configuration
member.remarks: At retry N the delay is BaseDelay * [1 + ScaleFactor * (N - 1)] (first retry can be immediate)

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.LinearBackoffConfig.FirstDelayZero
member.summary: Whether the first retry should be performed immediately

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.LinearBackoffConfig.BaseDelay
member.summary: The number of milliseconds used as the base to compute the interval after which a retry is performed
member.remarks: Must be greater than or equal to 0

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.LinearBackoffConfig.ScaleFactor
member.summary: The scale factor used to compute the interval after which a retry is performed
member.remarks: Must be greater than or equal to 0

member.name: M:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.LinearBackoffConfig.#ctor
member.summary: Builds a new instance of the LinearBackoffConfig class

member.name: T:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.PollyJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig
member.summary: Polly jittered exponential back-off configuration
member.remarks: At retry N the delay is min((next - prev) * 1/1.4 * BaseDelay, maxTimeSpan) (first retry can be immediate, prev = 0 and then next, next = 2^t * tanh(sqrt(4*t)) and t = N + randomDouble)

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.PollyJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig.FirstDelayZero
member.summary: Whether the first retry should be performed immediately

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.PollyJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig.BaseDelay
member.summary: The number of milliseconds used as the base to compute the interval after which a retry is performed
member.remarks: Must be greater than or equal to 0

member.name: P:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.PollyJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig.MaxDelay
member.summary: The maximum number of milliseconds used to compute the interval after which a retry is performed

member.name: M:NLog.Targets.Syslog.Settings.PollyJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig.#ctor
member.summary: Builds a new instance of the PollyJitteredExponentialBackoffConfig class
